titles.title: SF509 Safe in the shadow of the Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Safe in the shadow of the Lord
beneath his hand and power,
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
my fortress and my tower.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My hope is set on God alone
though Satan spreads his snare;
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
to keep me in his care.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
From fears and phantoms of the night,
from foes about my way,
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
by darkness as by day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
His holy angels keep my feet
secure from every stone;
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
and unafraid go on.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Strong in the everlasting name,
and in my Father's care,
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
who hears and answers prayer.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Safe in the shadow of the Lord,
possessed by love divine,
I trust in him,
I trust in him,
and meet his love with mine.
